name: h3
description: Introducing the 2025 Mizuno CRBN Pro Drop 10 USSSA Baseball Bat, a game-changer for both contact and power hitters. This bat, part of the renowned CRBN Pro series, features a sleek white, black, and sunrise colorway and is engineered with a two-piece composite design. With a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter and a drop 10 length-to-weight ratio, it meets the USSSA 1.15BPF NTS certification standards. The Dual Frequency Dampener technology reduces vibrations and flex, while the Black Onyx Carbon construction ensures durability and immediate game readiness. Additionally, the optimized end cap provides an impressive sound and enhanced pop on the sweet spot, and the Speed Helix Grip delivers unmatched comfort and durability. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on All Orders
Hitting Style: Built for Contact & Power Hitters
Dual Frequency Dampener: Reduces Vibrations & Flex for High Performance
Cylinder Seaming: Consistency across the Barrel

Speed Helix Grip: Provides Comfort & Durability
